title: OpenTelemetry Host Metrics Dashboard
description:
Default dashboard to visualize OpenTelemetry host metrics from the hostmetrics receiver.

For additional details, see the [specification (https://opentelemetry.io/docs/reference/specification/metrics/semantic_conventions/system-metrics/).

definition.content:
This is a default dashboard to visualize OpenTelemetry host metrics. [These metrics](https://app.datadoghq.com/metric/summary?filter=otel.system) come from the hostmetrics receiver.

##### [**Semantic Conventions for System Metrics ↗**](https://opentelemetry.io/docs/reference/specification/metrics/semantic_conventions/system-metrics/)

definition.title: Evolution of used system memory in the last hour
Disk weighted IO time per second
